titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

Oct. 30 Cheating Bride Nov 3 Nov 3 Drink for Mr Cherry Nov 7 Nov 7 Meriweather Mystery Nov 11 Nov 11 Stormy NIght Nov 14 Nov 14 Silent Witnesses Nov. 17 17 Figure Away Nov. 20 20 Christina Nov. 22 22 Christmas Holyday/ 2 f. a day Nov 24 24 Wall Nov 28 28 Dead Dont Care Nov 30 Nov 30 Candidate for Murder of Convenience Dec. 4 Renewed Nov 30 - Dec 30 1939 1 m A 25 Dec. 4 Christmas Tree Murders Dec. 8 8 Memory of Murder Dec. 11 11 D.A.
